291707.「そろったな。\n さっそくだが 貴様に話が……:
Good, you're here.
There's something urgent we need to discuss...

291708.「……ユーライザ！ 大丈夫なの～？\n 目の前で ヘルヴェルを失い つらい想いを:
Yuliza! Are you alright?
You lost Helvel right before your eyes.
Please, don't push yourself too hard...

291710.「ですが 今は 天星郷の一大事。\n ジア・クト念晶体から この世界を守るために:
But this is all so much bigger than me.
I must do what I can to protect this world
from the Dia Kut Telecrystal.

291711.「お姉様なら きっと そうしたはずですから。: I'm sure my sister would have done the same.

291712.「そう……。\n 強くなったのね ユーライザ。\n きっと ヘルヴェルの魂も 喜:
You've become so strong, Yuliza.
I'm sure Helvel is smiling down on you from
above.

291713.「まず 最初に……何を置いても\n <pc>には 謝っておかねばなるまいな。:
Now, before we get to business...
I need to apologize, <pc>.
For everything.

291714.「これまで 我ら天使は くだらぬ流言を信じ\n 貴様に対し 邪険な態度を 取って:
Not long ago, we were deceived by false rumors about you and behaved wickedly as a result.
I can't even begin to imagine how much hardship we put you through.

291715.「悪神の討伐 ジア・クト念晶体との戦闘……\n 貴様が成しとげた 数々の功績を:
In light of the defeat of the evil god Dia Kut
Telecrystal...
I must confess that we have been fools.

291716.「どうか これまでの非礼を 詫びさせてくれ。\n 虫のいいことだとは 百も承知だ:
Please accept our sincerest apologies.
I know this is asking a lot, but...are you
willing to lend us your aid once more?<yesno><close>

291717.「私からも お願いします。この世界を\n ジア・クトどもから守るには どうしても:
I echo his sentiment.
Please, we desperately need your power to
protect the world from Dia Kut.<yesno><close>

291718.「すまない。心から 感謝する……！:
I am truly sorry to have to make such a
request. From the bottom of my heart...
thank you!

291719.「……では 本題に入ろう。\n 先の戦いで 我々は ジア・クト念晶体を\n 撤退:
Right then, let's cut to the chase.
In our recent battle, we succeeded in
forcing the Dia Kut Telecrystal to retreat.

291720.「だが アストルティアの楯の加護を 失った以上\n ヤツらが 戻ってくるのは 時:
But now that we've lost the blessing of the Shield of Astoltia, it's only a matter of time before they return.
We must fortify our defenses as swiftly as possible.

291721.「しかし……同胞である ヘルヴェルが死に\n 英雄のひとり レオーネは\n ジア:
However...our compatriot Helvel is dead, and
one of the Champions, Leone, has joined hands
with Dia Kut.

291722.「貴様とフォステイル以外の 英雄たちは\n いまだ 眠りについたまま……。\n:
And with the exceptions of you and Fostail, all the remaining Champions have fallen into a deep sleep...
To be quite frank, the situation seems hopeless.

291723.「天星郷は 今 混乱のまっただ中にある。\n まずは これを おさめねば\n ヤ:
Heaven is in chaos.
Before we can even begin to stage any sort of
counterattack, we need to settle things here.

291724.「そのためにも ふたりには\n 行方不明となった 天使長の捜索を 頼みたい。:
To that end, I ask that you two begin
searching for the missing Archangel.

291725.「ですが あれだけの攻撃を受け 天使長が\n ご無事かどうか……。そもそも 今ど:
But after sustaining so much damage, we can't
be certain that she's safe...or where to even
begin looking, for that matter.

291726.「その点なら 心配ご無用。\n 天使長の足取りは 見当がついていますよ。:
No need to worry about that.
I have a good lead on her location.

291727.「時間が かかってしまいましたが\n あの方の持つ 天使のチカラを たどることで:
It took some doing, but by tracing her angelic
powers, I was able to approximate her
whereabouts.

291728.「天使長は あのジア・ルミナと名乗る者の\n 攻撃を受け 天星郷から\n 下界に:
After the attack by the one calling herself
Dia Lumina, she fell to the lower world.

291729.「そのまま アストルティアの南東\n プクランド大陸の チョッピ荒野あたりに\n:
She seems to have drifted towards a region in
southeast Astoltia一namely, Choppi Wilderness
in Pukuland

291730.「しかし……どういうわけか\n そこで チカラの反応が薄れ\n 正確な位置は わ:
Yet...for some reason, her power faded, and I
was unable to determine her exact
whereabouts...

291731.「もしかしたら 天使長の身に\n 何か 起こったのかも しれません。: Something may have happened to her.

291732.「チョッピ荒野には 人々の集う集落が\n あるようだが……そこで 情報を集めるの:
There's a wild settlement in the Choppi Wilderness...
but frankly, gathering intel there is a difficult task for an angel unfamiliar with the land.

291733.「もはや 我々には 一刻の猶予もない。\n 急ぎ アストルティアにおもむき\n:
We have no time to lose.
I need you to go to Astoltia and retrieve the
Archangel!

291734.「……おっ 見ない顔だな。\n よそ者かァ？:
Now dere's an unfamiliar face!
Youse new 'round heah?

291735.「ヒヒッ ようこそ\n 享楽と堕落の都 魔窟アラモンドへ！:
Allow me to kindly welcome youse to Alamond
Cavern, city of pleasure an' corruption!

291736.「ここは ならず者 おたずね者……。\n 人生の落ちこぼれどもが集う ゴミためさ:
Riffraff, rejoice!
Dis here's a paradise for the down-an'-outs
a' life.

291737.「昔は まっとうな 鉱山だったんだけどなァ。\n 廃坑になってからは プクランド:
Used ta be, dis place was an honest mine.
But evah since it got abandoned, crooks from all over Pukusland have swarmed heah like flies, and you can see what's become of it.

291738.「アンタらは どうして ここに？\n 盗みや殺し……表舞台から 追い出されるよう:
So, whatta YOUSE doin' here? Mug someone? Ice a fella?
What'd you do that was bad enough ta get ya kicked offa the fastidious stage a' life?

291740.「ね～ぇ……<heart>\n アンタ どこから来たの～？\n アタシと 遊ばな:
Hey there, cutie～<heart>
Where'd you wander in from～?
Do ya wanna come play with me～?

291741.「け 結構ですッ！ 間に合ってますので！:
N-no thank you!
We're pressed for time!

291742.「危ないところでした……。\n 気をつけてくださいね <pc>。:
That was a close call...
Be careful here, <pc>.

291743.「……なんと 罪深き者たちでしょう。\n 本当に このようなところに\n 天使長:
...What a sinful place.
Will we really find the Archangel in a town
like this?

291746.「間違いありません！ 天使の羽根です！:
No doubt about it!
It's an Angel Feather!

291748.「これが あるということは\n 天使長は やはり ここにいると見て\n 間違いな:
This confirms that the Archangel is here after
all.

291749.「まさか 悪党どもに つかまり\n 身動きが 取れなくなっているのでは！？\n:
No way! She's stuck in the middle of nowhere
with a bunch of一of HOODLUMS?!
We have to help her as swiftly as possible!

291750.「まずは このあたりの者たちに\n 話を 聞いてみましょう。天使長のことを\n:
First, we need to speak to the citizenry here.
Maybe some of them have seen her.

291751.「……これはこれは。\n エルトナ大陸を牛耳ってる あのツバクロ組と\n 取り引:
Che bello. It's an honor to-a do business with
a member of the Barn Swallows. You-a control
Eltona from the shadows, no?

291752.「ようこそ 魔窟アラモンドへ！\n 歓迎するぜぇ。:
Welcome to Alamond Cavern!
We receive-a you wid open arms.

291753.「俺は ここでの商売を\n 取り仕切っている プティーノだ。\n ま ヨロシク頼:
I'm-a Putino, the man in charge of bidness
here. I look forward to working wid you.

291754.「アンタたちとの取り引きは はじめてだからな。\n まずは 商品の説明を させて:
Now, dis is our first time doin' business, no?
Lemme start by explainin' the product.

291755.「ウワサには 聞いてるだろう？\n これが このアラモンドでしか採れない\n 幻:
You've-a heard the rumors, right, compagno?
Dis here's Alamond Ore.
Like-a the name says, it's-a only found here.

291756.「コイツは タダの鉱石じゃないぞ。\n 最高級の砂糖……アラモン糖の材料になる\:
And this isn't just any old ore, capiche?
It's made of a rare white material dat's used
to make the legendary Alamond Sugar.

291757.「ひとくち食べるだけで まさに楽園の心地。\n かつて プクランド中の プクリポ:
Just one bite is a taste of paradiso.
Once, Pukulipo all over Pukuland were crazy for its sugary yumminess. Fa venire l’acquolina in bocca!

291758.「だが アラモン糖の あまりのウマさに\n 大陸中のプクリポが 菓子の食い過ぎで:
But dat yummy sugar was-a SO yummy that Pukulipo all over da continent became fatsos from eatin' too many sweets, y'see?
It became a bit of a, how you say, "social issue".

291759.「当時 即位したばかりの プーポッパン王は\n 肥満の原因である アラモン糖を\:
King Puupoppan, who had recently ascended to
da throne, ordered the mine closed in
order to destroy the root cause of da obesity.

291760.「かくして アラモン糖は\n プクランド大陸から 姿を消し\n プクリポたちの健:
Thus, Alamond Sugar vanished from Pukuland,
and da Pukulipos' health was preserved...

291761.「ヒヒッ……だが どうしても\n アラモン糖の味を 忘れられない\n 甘党の皆様:
But dere's a strong demand from those with a
sweet tooth who just can't get the taste of
Alamond sugar outta dere minds, see?

291762.「どうしてもって 言われちゃ しかたねえ。\n こっそり ご提供して\n ガッポ:
And if-a they insist, who's am I to say no,
you know? So we make a lotta moolah by
offerin' it to 'em all secret-like.

291763.「アラモン糖をご所望ってことは スイーツ関係で\n 新しいビジネスを 始めるんだ:
If you wants Alamond sugar, dat must mean you're startin' a new bidness in the sweets industry, no?
Heh! You've got a good eye for opportunity!

291764.「アンタらとは 今後とも\n ヨロシクやっていきたいし\n 特別価格で 融通して:
I looks forward to workin' with you.
I'll even offer you a special price as a show
of goodwill.

291765.「……そんなものに 用はありません！\n 私たちは 大切なお方を\n 救出するた:
We have no use for something like that!
We're here to rescue someone very important
to us.

291766.「すでに 調べはついています！\n 翼の生えた女性が ここにいるはずです！\n:
We've investigated around the town, and we
know the winged lady is here!
Release her immediately, or else...!

291767.「はっはっはっは！ なーるほどなぁ。\n アンタら あのヒトの知り合いか！:
Ha ha ha ha! Capisco!
You guys-a know that chick?

291768.「身内を助けるために わざわざ\n こんなとこまで来るとは 健気じゃねえか。\n:
Comin' all the ways here to help one of your
own, ain't that just heartwarming?
Howevah...

291769.「おおっと お帰りのようだ。\n どうしても連れて帰りたきゃ 副長の俺じゃなく\:
Oh, sounds like da boss is back.
If you really wanna take that chick home, you'll have to negotiate directly with the emperor, not with me, the second-in-command.

291771.「キャ～！ 帝王 カッコイイ～！！:
Eek～!
The emperor is, like, SO cool～!!

291772.「……ハハハッ いいね。\n やはり 気分がクサクサしたときには\n コイツを:
Hahaha, you're too kind.
Whenever I'm in a bad mood, I just roll this
bad boy out and all that stress goes away.

291773.「お前らァ どけどけぇーい！\n 我らが 魔窟アラモンドを 統べるボス……\n:
Make way, one and all!
Here comes the big boss who rules this den of
sin: the one, the only...Meteor! Queen! MITRA!

291774.「て 天使長！？ 何やってるんですかッ！: A-archangel?! What are you doing here?!

291775.「おや？ お前たち どうしてここに？: Hmm? I should ask you the same question.

291776.「どうしてって……。\n 私たち 天使長を助けにきたんです。\n この集落の悪党:
We're here to help you.
We...thought these ruffians had kidnapped
you...

291777.「……あーっはっはっはっは！ これは傑作だ。\n 私が コイツらに つかまっただ:
...Ahahahaha!
Oh, this is priceless! You really thought
these guys had taken me captive?

291778.「ここへ 落ちてきたときの衝撃で\n チカラの大半を失くし\n ご覧の通り 片翼:
When I fell here, I lost most of my strength.
Even lost one of my wings, as you can see.

291779.「天星郷には帰れないし 行くあてもないしで\n フラフラしてたら チョッピ荒野で:
I couldn't return to Heaven, and I didn't have anywhere else to go, so I wandered around the wilderness for a while when some of these
little guys started teasing me.

291780.「ちょうど 虫の居どころが 悪かったから\n 腹いせに 返り討ちにしてやったら\:
I was hardly in the mood, and I ended up taking out my anger on them.
For some reason, they took a liking to me after that and made me their boss.

291781.「そんなことより……これを見てくれ！\n 愛する大陸間鉄道を モチーフに作らせた:
But that's hardly important right now... Feast your eyes on THIS baby!
I had it custom made in the image of my beloved Ark of the Earth. What you you think? Beautiful, isn't she?

291782.「ひとまず ご無事なようで 何よりです！\n さあ いっしょに 天星郷に戻りまし:
In any case, I'm glad that you're safe.
Now come, we need to return to Heaven.
Everyone is so worried about you...

291783.「……悪いが 天星郷に戻る気は ない。:
...Sorry, but I have no intention of going
back there.

291784.「私がいようといまいと 結果は変わらない。\n アストルティアは……滅びる運命。:
With or without me, the outcome won't change.
Astoltia...is doomed.

291785.「フフッ どちらにしろ 片翼を失った 私には\n 戦うことはおろか 天星郷に戻る:
Heh. Besides, without my other wing, there's
no way I'd be able to fight or go back to the
Celestial City anyway.

291786.「天使長の座は そうだな……。\n カンティスにでも ゆずろう。みんなには\n:
As for the Archangel position... Oh, I know!
Kantis can have it. Just go back and tell
everyone that Mitra is dead.

291788.「ずっと 天使たちの先頭に立ち\n 世界の守護のため 尽力してきた あなたが\n:
You've been at the forefront of our efforts to
protect the world all these years!
So...why...?

291789.「……もしかして アンタたちさぁ。\n ミト様 追っかけてる系？:
...Hey, you two.
Are you, like, looking for Mimi too, by any
chance?

291791.「ウェ～～～イ！ やっぱりぃ～！\n アンタたち ミト様の\n 熱烈なファン的な:
WAAAAAAY～! I KNEW it!
You guys are, like, totally Miti fans too,
aren't you?!

291792.「ミト様って カリスマっていうの～？\n すんごいオーラ 出てるもんね～？\n:
Miti's like, soooooo charming, isn't she～? Don't you, like, lowkey get GOOSEBUMPS just thinking about her～?
It's only natural that she'd have fans from out of town.

291793.「アタシも ミト様 マジすこなの！\n ミト担のヒトに会えて 超カンゲキ～！\n:
I'm actually like a huuuuuuuge Mito fan too!
And I LOVE meeting other fans～!
Come on, let's be friends! WAY★!

291795.「とりま 親睦深めるために お茶しな～い？\n みんなで 思う存分 ミト様トーク:
Wanna, like, chat over tea to get to know each
other better? We can talk about Mito 'til the
sun comes up! ...Way! It's decided.★

291796.「ここの１階に アタシ オススメの\n 超バズってる カフェがあるから～！\n:
There's a cafe on the first floor here that's,
like, literally the best.
I'm going on ahead! Don't be long～!

291797.「……行ってしまいました。\n 何を言っているのか ほとんど\n 理解できません:
...And there she goes.
I could hardly understand a word she was
saying...

291798.「ここで こうしていても しかたがありません。\n とりあえず あの娘の話を\n:
Well, we don't have anything else to do here.
I guess for now, let's just hear what she has
to say.

291799.「おっ疲れちゃ～ん★\n 流れ星 見つかった～？: Hey, did you find the shooting star?

291800.「４つめの……最後の流れ星については\n 何か わかりましたか？:
What did you find out about the fourth... last
shooting star?

291801.「……ぜーんぜんっ！\n チョッピ荒野に 落ちたらしいって話なんだけど\n そん:
...absolutely nothing! I heard that it might
have fallen into the Choppi Wilderness, but
there's no sign of it.

291803.「早く 見つけてあげたいな～！\n きっと ミト様 気分あげぽよ\n 間違いなー:
I can't wait to find him! I'm sure Mito-sama
will be so happy to see him!

291804.「ほう？ どう あげぽよ なのかな？\n ぜひ 聞かせてほしいものだねぇ。:
Hou? How do you like it? I'd love to hear
about it.

291805.「て 天使長っ！ どうしてここに？: Hey, Archangel! What are you doing here?

291806.「どうしてって 私は ここの常連だからね。\n 過去に絶望して 死ぬほど 甘いも:
Because I'm a regular here. I come here when
I'm desperate for something sweet to eat and
dying of despair over the past.

291807.「ふっふっふ……ユーライザぁ。\n ここのスイーツは 絶品だぞう？\n どんな苦:
Yuliza. The sweets here are exquisite. They
make you forget any bitter memories.

291808.「最高級の アラモン糖を\n たーっぷり使った カロリーマシマシ\n 悪魔の味だ:
It's a calorie-laden demon made with lots of
the finest aramon sugar.

291809.「アラモンドに 足を踏み入れて\n これを食さずに帰るなど 言語道断！\n 店長:
It would be unthinkable to set foot in Alamond
and leave without trying this! Manager! Two
Lovely Rainbow Teas!

291810.「こ これは……！\n こんな おいしいもの\n はじめて クチにしました……！:
This is...! This is the first time I've ever
had such a delicious mouthful...!

291811.「でしょ？ でしょ～？\n ユーちゃんに 気に入ってもらえて\n 超ウレシ～！:
Right? Right? I'm so happy that Yu-chan likes
it! Way!

291812.「ねぇねぇ ユーちゃんって\n もともと ミト様の知り合いなんでしょ～？\n ミ:
Hey, you know Mito-sama, don't you? What did
Mito do at your old place?

291813.「えっと 天使ちょ……ミトラー様は\n 私が 住んでいる地を\n 治めていらっし:
Well, Angel...Mitra rules the land where I
live...

291814.「この世界に暮らす皆が 平和に過ごせるよう\n 日々 尽力している\n すばらし:
He is a wonderful person who works hard every
day to ensure that everyone in this world can
live in peace.

291815.「それって ユーちゃんの住んでたとこでも\n 帝王やってたってコト～？\n ウェ:
Does that mean you were the emperor where you
lived? Yay! That's great, Mito-sama~!

291816.「ミト様って 鬼ツヨだし ルックスも神っしょ？\n だから アラモンドのみんなか:
Mito, you're a superhero and you have the
looks of a god, right? That's why everyone in
Alamond respects you so much.

291817.「アタシもさ～ ちっちゃいころに\n 親を亡くして ひとりで生きてきて～\n 頼:
I, too, lost my parents when I was a child and
have lived on my own... and there was no one I
could rely on at all... but...

291818.「ミト様は 出会ったばかりの アタシに\n 優しくしてくれて 守ってくれて ママ:
Mito-sama was kind to me when I first met him
and protected me, and I wondered what it would
be like if I had a mom...

291819.「ミト様は アタシの……アラモンドのママなの！\n ミト様がいてくれるから アタ:
Mito is my Alamond's mommy! We are all so
happy because of you!

291820.「ミト様 だーいすきっ★\n ずーっと アタシたちと いっしょにいてね！\n 約: Mito-sama, you're the best! I promise.

291821.「ああ……そうだね。\n お前たちと ずっと こうしていられたら……。:
Oh... yes. If I could be like this with you
guys forever...

291822.「すまない 急用を思いだした。\n 私は ここで 失礼するよ。:
I'm sorry. I had to take care of something.
I'll leave you to it.

291823.「……やっぱ ミト様 テンション低いな～。\n 超しんぱ～い……。:
I knew it....Mito-sama, you're not very
excited.... Super depressed...

291827.「歩き回って お疲れ系？\n そりゃ そうだよね～。\n たくさん歩かせちゃって:
Tired from all that walking? That's right~!
I'm sorry I made you walk so much~!

291828.「こんなこともあろうかと 宿屋のおばちゃんに\n 部屋用意しとくよう 頼んどいた:
I asked the Inn lady to prepare a room for
you, just in case something like this happens!
Have a good rest~! Way~!

291829.「……そうですね。\n <pc>も 疲れたでしょう？\n お言葉に甘えることに:
...I know... <pc> must be tired too,
right? I'll take your word for it.

291831.「天使長 お願いします。\n どうか 天星郷に お戻りください。: Archangel, please. Please return to Heaven.

291832.「ジア・クトを倒し アストルティアを守るために\n どうしても あなたのおチカラ:
We desperately need your help to defeat Dia
Kut and protect Astoltia.

291833.「……倒す か。\n 簡単に 言ってくれるな。\n ヤツらを倒せると 本気で思っ:
...Beat you? Don't make it sound so easy. Do
you really think you can beat them?

291834.「いい機会だ。教えてやろう。\n ヤツらと 我ら天使の因縁を。\n 我らが故郷…:
It's a good opportunity. Let me tell you
something. The fate of them and us angels. Our
home... the Eternal Cradle.

291835.「これは 創世の女神と その眷属たちの物語……:
This is the story of the Goddess of Creation
and her dependents...

291836.「ここより はるか彼方……星の海の向こう側。\n とこしえのゆりかごという 世界:
Far from here, beyond the sea of stars. There
was a world called the Eternal Cradle.

291837.「偉大なる神々の 加護を受け\n すべての生きとし 生ける者たちが\n 平和に暮:
An ideal world where all living creatures live
in peace under the blessings of the great
gods...

291838.「だが 平和な日々に 終わりを告げるように\n ヤツら……ジア・クト念晶体が\n:
But as if to signal the end of the peaceful
days, the Dia Kut telecrystals appeared.

291839.「いにしえの大崩壊と呼ばれる 厄災……\n ヤツらは とこしえのゆりかごを蹂躙し:
In the ancient catastrophe known as the Great Collapse, they laid waste to the Eternal Cradle and went to great lengths to destroy
it.

291840.「とこしえのゆりかごを創りし 古き神は\n 若き女神 ルティアナに 創生のチカラ:
The ancient god who created the Eternal Cradle entrusts the power of creation to the young goddess Lutiana, and she rises from the
perishing world.

291841.「我らの祖先……とこしえのゆりかごの住人たちも\n 天の船 フォーリオンに乗り\:
Our ancestors, the inhabitants of the Eternal
Cradle, also left the cradle with the goddess
on the heavenly ship Fourion.

291842.「長き長き 旅の果て ついに\n 女神は 安息の地にたどりつき\n 創生のチカラ:
At the end of her long, long journey, the goddess finally arrives at a place of rest and creates a new world with the power of
creation.

291843.「その地の名は アストルティア。\n ゆりかごの民が待ち望んだ 最後の楽園。:
The name of the land is Astoltia. The last
Utopia that the people of the cradle have
longed for.

291844.「女神は この楽園を ジア・クトの魔の手から\n 守るため すべての邪悪を しり:
To protect this Utopia from the clutches of Dia Kut, the goddess created the Shield of Astoltia, a hidden treasure that makes all
evil flinch away.

291845.「しかし……楯が完成する前に\n 深い闇にまぎれ アストルティアに\n 潜りこむ:
But... before the shield was completed,
someone managed to sneak into Astoltia under
the cover of deep darkness.

291847.「そう……我々が 異界滅神ジャゴヌバと\n 呼んでいた厄災は もともとは\n ジ:
Yes... the disaster we called Eldritch God
Jagonuba was originally a piece of Dia Kut
telecrystal.

291848.「アストルティアの楯の結界が あったからこそ\n 我々は 長い間 ジャゴヌバ以外:
It was only because of the Shield of Astoltia's Shield of Astoltia that we were able to hide from all but Jagonuba's Dia Kut
for so long.

291849.「だが アストルティアの楯が 破壊され\n ヤツらに 存在が知られてしまった以上:
But now that the Shield of Astoltia has been
destroyed and their presence known, there is
nothing we can do.

291850.「あの子も……ヘルヴェルも 死なせてしまった。\n ジア・クトに 勝つことなど:
I let her and Helvel die. There is no way I
can win against Dia Kut. Everything I've tried
to do has been for nothing.

291853.「私は……<pc>をはじめとした\n 英雄たちと出会い その生き様に触れ……\n:
I... met <pc> and other heroes and
was exposed to their way of life... and
learned a lot from them.

291854.「私は……<pc>をはじめとした\n 英雄たちと出会い その生き様に触れ……\n:
I... met <pc> and other heroes and
was exposed to their way of life... and
learned a lot from them.

291855.「みな 祖国と大切な者たちを 守るため\n その命をかけて 戦っていた。\n た:
They were all fighting for their lives to
protect their homeland and those they cared
about. Even if the battle was unwinnable.

291856.「四天の星巡りに挑み 神になろうとしたのも\n みな この世界……アストルティア:
It is because they love this world, Astoltia,
with all their hearts that they challenge the
four stars and try to become gods.

291857.「彼らが守ろうとした世界を……その想いを！\n 運命なんて言葉で 片づけるなど\:
The world they were trying to protect... their
feelings! We cannot allow fate to be the only
word for it!

291858.「ここで 私たちが あきらめてしまえば\n 世界は ジア・クトどもに\n 踏みに:
If we give up now, the world will be trampled
by Dia Kut.

291859.「ピコさんも……\n アラモンドに暮らす 皆さんも\n みんな みんな 死んでし:
Mr. Pico... and all of you who live in
Alamond... you are all going to die!

291860.「それが 運命だと……\n 滅びるのは しかたないことだと\n 本気で おっしゃ:
Are you seriously saying that it is fate...
that it is inevitable that we will perish?

291861.「……やれやれ 私相手に\n 言うようになったじゃないか。だんだんと\n ヘルヴ:
Well, well, well...now you're talking to me.
You're starting to sound more and more like
Helvel.

291862.「お前たちが 探していたのは コレだろう？: Isn't this what you've been looking for?

291863.「お前たちの集めてきた分と 合わせれば\n かつてのチカラを 取り戻し\n 天星:
If we can combine the amount of money you have
collected with ours, we can regain our former
strength and return to Heaven.

291864.「アストルティアに生を受けた者の 代表として\n お前に問おう。ジア・クト念晶体:
As a representative of those born in Astoltia, I ask you this. Do you have the will and the determination to fight the Dia Kut telecrystal
and protect the world?

291865.「この戦いは 厳しいものになるでしょう……。\n ですが 数々の危機を 乗り越え:
This battle will be a tough one... but you've
been through so many crises, you'll be fine.
Have confidence in yourself.

291866.「前にも言った通り 天星郷に戻るつもりはない。\n どうしても 私を 連れ戻した:
As I told you before, I have no intention of returning to Heaven. If you insist on bringing me back, then you will have to follow the
customs of this place.

291867.「魔窟アラモンドでは 勝者こそが正義……。\n 私と決闘しろ <pc>。\n お:
In Alamond Cavern, the winner is justice...
duel with me, <pc>. If you win, take
me back to wherever you came from.

291868.「決闘の内容は こちらで決める。\n その気になったら アラモンドの広場にいる\:
We will decide the details of the duel. If you
feel up to it, call out to Pechapo in
Alamond's plaza.

291869.「この 帝王ミトラーに 簡単に勝てると思うな。\n アストルティアを救いたいと:
Do not think that you can easily defeat this
Emperor Mitra. If you want to save Astoltia,
show me your resolve in this contest.

291870.<pc>と ユーライザは\n宿屋に戻り 眠りについた。:
<pc> and Yuliza returned to the Inn
and fell asleep.

291872.「これより！ 流星の帝王 ミトラーと\n 挑戦者 <pc>の 決闘を執り行う！:
Here we go! The duel between Emperor Meteor,
Mitra, and his challenger, <pc>, is
now underway!

291873.「ルールは いたって シンプルだ。\n チョッピ荒野の 断崖に向かって 全力で\:
The rules are simple. Ride your Dol-Bike as
fast as you can toward the cliffs of Choppi
Wilderness in a deadly race of chicken!

291874.「ビビッて 先に ブレーキをかけるか\n 判断を誤り 海に落ちたほうの負けだ！:
The one who gets scared and brakes first or
makes a bad decision and falls into the sea
loses!

291875.「よーし 両者 覚悟はできたか！？\n エンジンをかけろぉ！:
All right, both of you, are you ready? Start
the engine!

291909.「おかしいですね……。\n ピコさんの姿が 見えません。\n どこへ行ってしまっ:
It's strange... I can't see Pico. Where has he
gone?

291912.「うわぁぁ～～ん！ 来ないで～～～～！！\n マジ ムリだっての～～～～！！:
Oh my gosh!!! Don't come to ～～～～! I really
can't ～～～～!

291913.「あ！ バカバカバカ！\n それは ミト様の だいじなものなの！\n 返して 返:
Aah! Stupid, stupid, stupid! Those are Mr.
Mito's Key Items! Give it back, give it back,
give it back!

291914.「……天使のチカラを 取り込んで 変身した！？: He took the power of an angel and transformed!

291915.「チカラを制御できずに 暴走している！\n ……いけないッ！:
He can't control his power. He's out of
control! No!

291917.「クッ……さすがは 天使長のチカラ。\n ピコさんを かばいながら\n 戦うのは:
As expected of the power of the Archangel.
It's going to be hard to fight while covering
for Mr. Pico...

291918.「おい そこのデカブツーッ！\n 私のかわいいピコに 何してやがるオラァッッ！:
Hey, you big butthole! What are you doing to
my little Pico, you son of a bitch!

291919.「ピコのことは まかせろ！\n 結界を張るから\n お前たちは 存分に戦ってくれ:
I'll take care of Pico! I'll set up the wards
and you guys can fight as hard as you want!

291920.「ふぅ……よくやってくれたね。\n ふたりとも。: Whew...you did a great job. Both of you.

291924.「……これまで この世界を守るのは\n 祖先より 受け継がれた使命だからと……\:
Until now, I've thought of protecting this world as a mission handed down to me from my ancestors, as if it were someone else's
responsibility.

291925.「しかし アストルティアに 降りたち\n アラモンドの皆と 過ごしているうちに\:
But as I arrived in Astoltia and spent more
and more time with the Aramonde people, I
began to change my mind...

291926.「私は ここに生きる者たちが 好きだ。\n アストルティアに 生きる者すべてを\:
I like the people who live here. I want to
protect all those who live in Astoltia. I
don't want them to die.

291927.「だが ジア・クトの勢力は 強大だ。\n 私が ひとつでも 決断を間違えば\n:
But Dia Kut is powerful. If I make even one
wrong decision, many will lose their lives.

291928.「私が しくじれば 私の大切な者たちが\n みんな みんな 死んでしまう。\n:
If I screw up, everyone I care about will die.
That's what I'm so afraid of...

291930.「ミト様なら できるよ！\n ミト様 すんごく 強いんだもん！\n どんなヤツが:
Mito-sama can do it! Mito-sama is very strong!
No matter who he is, I'm sure I can beat him!

291931.「アタシ 知ってるもん！\n ミト様が どんなに すごいヒトか！:
I know! I know what an amazing person Mito-
sama is!

291932.「ミト様が 自分を信じられないなら\n アタシたちが 信じるから！\n だから:
If Mito-sama doesn't believe in himself, we
will! So you're absolutely fine!

291933.「そ そうだそうだ！\n ウチの帝王は 最強だ！\n 誰にも 負けたりなんて し:
Yes, yes, yes! Our king is the most powerful!
No one can defeat him!

291934.「アタシたち……ううん！\n この世界みんなの 帝王になってよ！\n それで こ:
We... no! You must become the emperor of this
world! And protect this world!

291935.「帝王！ 帝王！！ 帝王！！！\n 帝王！ 帝王！！ 帝王！！！:
The emperor! The king! The emperor! The
Emperor! The Emperor! The Emperor!

291938.「……聞けぇ お前たちィ！\n 私は 今日で 魔窟アラモンドの帝王を\n 卒業す:
Listen up, boys! Today, I graduate from the
throne of Alamond Cavern!

291939.「この世界に 仇なす\n クソったれどもを ぶっ潰すため\n 私は 私のあるべき:
I'm going back to where I belong, to beat the
bastards who have wronged this world!

291940.「ここに 誓う！ 私は\n 全世界の帝王として アストルティアを！\n お前たち:
I hereby swear! I, the king of all the world,
will protect Astoltia! I will protect you all!

291941.「……愛してるぜ！ お前ら！\n 達者で 暮らせよ！: ...I love you! You guys! Live well!

291943.「さぁ 私たちも 天星郷に帰りましょう。: Come on, let's go back to Heaven.

291944.「やぁ。ふたりとも アラモンドでは\n すっかり 世話になったね。:
Hey, guys. You two were a big help to me in
Alamond.

291945.「これは 私からの 感謝の気持ちだ。\n 遠慮せずに 受け取ってくれ。:
This is my way of saying thank you. Feel free
to accept it.

291946.「……皆 私のいない間 苦労をかけた。: ...everyone has suffered a lot in my absence.

291947.「先の戦いで 我らは 多くのものを失った。\n アストルティアの楯を 破壊されて:
We lost so much in the last battle. Now that
the Shield of Astoltia has been destroyed, a
battle with Dia Kut is inevitable.

291948.「だが どれだけ 厳しい戦になろうとも\n 我々に 敗北は許されない。:
But no matter how hard the battle gets, we
cannot afford to lose.

291949.「諸君 剣を取れ！ 今こそ 我らの手で\n 神話時代からの因縁に 決着をつけると:
Gentlemen, take up your swords! Now is the
time for us to settle a score that dates back
to mythical times!

291950.「……私は もう 逃げない。\n たとえ 我が身が 朽ち果てようとも\n この世:
I will run no more. Even if my body is to rot
away, I will fight to protect this world and
those I hold dear.

291951.「すべては アストルティアのために。\n それが 世界の守り人である\n 我らの:
All for the sake of Astoltia. That is our
mission, the guardians of the world!

291952.「……よーし てめえらァ！\n この全面戦争 絶対に勝利するぞ！\n ジア・クト:
All right, you guys! We're going to win this
all-out war! I'm gonna kick Dia Kut's ass!

291953.「て 天使長……。\n その 言葉遣いは いったい……？:
Hey, Archangel... what the heck is that
language?

291954.「ほほほ！\n 天使長ったら アストルティアに行くたび\n 何かしら影響されて:
Ho-ho-ho! Every time Archangel goes to
Astoltia, he comes back affected in some way~!

291955.「４００年前も たしか そうでしたね……。: I believe it was like that 400 years ago...

291957.「騒がしいぞ。何があった？: You're making a racket. What happened?

291958.「て て て 天星郷の空に……\n きょ きょ 巨大な……: In the sky of Heaven... a giant...

291959.「とにかく 外に出て 見てみてください！\n エライことが 起きてるんでさあ！:
Anyway, get out there and take a look!
Something terrible is happening!

295291.「……ふむ。興味深い。\n どういう仕掛けに なっているのかな？: ...hmmm. Interesting. I wonder how it works?

295292.「ちっ……もう戻ってきたか。\n こんなに 早いとは……。:
Damn...you're back already. I didn't realize
it was so soon...

295293.「ンフフ……<heart>\n また会えたな ゆりかごの末裔よ。:
Nuh-uh...<heart> So good to see you again,
Descendant of the Cradle.

295294.「想定外だった。まさか お前たちに\n 我らを退けるだけの チカラがあったとは。:
It was unexpected. I never thought you had the
strength to defeat us.

295295.「認めよう お前たちを。\n ジア・クトに 相応する敵として！\n よって ここ:
I recognize you. As worthy enemies of Dia Kut!
Therefore, I hereby declare.

295296.「アストルティアへの侵略を 開始する！: We are launching an invasion of Astoltia!

295297.「うっ……！ この光は！？\n 何が起こったの……？: Ugh...! What is this light? What happened...?

295298.「て 天使長っ！\n オーグリード大陸の バドリー岩石地帯の南に\n 異常なエネ:
Archangel! There's an anomalous energy
signature to the south of the Budley Rock Zone
on Ogreed Continent!

295299.「ここからでも わかるほどに\n 強い エネルギー反応……。\n 周辺も 無事で:
The energy signature is so strong that even
from here I can tell that the surrounding area
is not safe.

295300.「ついに 我が船が 着陸を果たした！\n お前たちの 大地に！: At last, my ship has landed! On your soil!

295301.「ンフ……<heart> 待っているぞ。\n 見せてみろ。お前たちのあがきを。:
Nuh...<heart> I'm waiting for you. Show us. Let's
see how you guys do.

295302.「船が 着陸した……？\n 急いで アストルティアの人々に\n 警告しなくては…:
A ship has landed...? We must hurry and warn
the people of Astoltia.

295303.「落ち着け ユーライザ。\n いずれ こうなることは わかっていた。:
Calm down, Yuliza. I knew this would happen
sooner or later.

295304.「私の方でも 対策は考えているが\n 事態は 一刻を争うようだ。:
I am trying to think of countermeasures, but
the situation seems to be time sensitive.

295305.「まずは すぐに動ける お前たちふたりで\n 地上周辺の調査に 向かってくれ。:
First, I want you two, who can move quickly,
to investigate the area around the ground.

295306.「しょ……承知いたしました。\n 動揺してしまい 申し訳ありません。: I understand. I am sorry for being upset.

295307.「バドリー岩石地帯といえば たしか\n ガートラント王国の 近くだったはずです。:
The Budley Rock Zone, I believe, is near the
Kingdom of Gartlant.

295308.「<pc>は ガートラントの王である\n グロスナー王とも 顔見知りでしたね。:
<pc> was also acquainted with King
Grossner, king of Gartlant.

295309.「船に近寄らないよう 警告も必要でしょうし \n オーグリード大陸の ガートラン:
We may need to warn him to stay away from the
ship, and we should go see King Grossner at
Gartlant Castle in Ogreed Continent.

302438.断崖が 近づいてきた……。\nブレーキを かけますか？<yesno_nc><cl:
The cliff is getting closer... should we hit
the brakes?<yesno_nc><close>

302440.「おおっと 挑戦者 <pc>が\n ビビッて 先に ブレーキをかけた！\n だが:
Oh, the challenger <pc> got spooked
and hit the brakes first! But as expected, he
did it too soon~!

302441.「我らが 流星の帝王は\n 見事 断崖スレスレで ストーップ！\n この勝負 ミ: Our Emperor Meteor, Stoops! Mitra wins!

302443.ショックのあまり 意識が 遠のいていく……。: In shock, he faded into unconsciousness...

302444.「……おおっと！？\n 両者 まだ ブレーキをかける様子がない！\n コイツは:
...Oh, wow! Neither one of them seems to be
applying the brakes yet! This guy's got some
balls!

302445.さらに 断崖が 近づいてきた……。\nブレーキを かけますか？<yesno_nc:
And now we're getting closer to the
precipice... should we hit the brakes?<yesno_nc><close>

302446.「おおっと 挑戦者 <pc>は\n まだ ブレーキをかけない！\n おいおいおい:
Oh, the challenger <pc> hasn't put on
the brakes yet! Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa are you
okay!?

302447.<pc>は 勢いよく 海につっこんだ！:
<pc> plunged into the ocean with a
mighty splash!

302448.「はっはっは！ あわれな挑戦者が\n 海に ダーーーーーイブッ！\n この勝負:
Ha-ha-ha! The wretched challenger is in the
sea! Mitra wins!

302450.ショックのあまり 意識が 遠のいていく……。: In shock, he faded into unconsciousness...

302451.「おおっと！？\n ここで 挑戦者 <pc>が\n ブレーキを かけたぁ！:
Oh, no! Here comes the challenger
<pc> putting on the brakes!

302452.「……いい読みだが まだ甘いな。\n その程度で 私を出し抜くことはできん！:
...a good read, but still naive. You can't
outsmart me like that!

302457.「フッ 帝王である この私を負かすとは。\n さすがは 四天の星巡りを乗り越えた:
How dare you defeat me, the emperor of the
world. As expected of a hero who overcame the
four star-circuits of the heavens.

302458.「……言い訳はしない。約束は約束だ。\n 天星郷に 戻るとしよう。\n 羽根を渡:
...No excuses. A promise is a promise. Let's
go back to Heaven. Give me the feather.

302460.「これを 受けとったら ミト様\n 元いた場所に 帰っちゃうんでしょ！？\n そ:
If I take this, Mito-sama, you'll go back to
where you came from, right? That's absolutely
not allowed!

302461.「ミト様 超つらそうな顔してたもん！\n そんな思いさせるんだったら\n 絶対に:
Mito-sama, you looked so pained! I won't let
you take him if you make me feel like that!

302463.「……事情は知らんが アレ\n アンタらの だいじなものなんだろ？\n 追っかけ:
I don't know what's going on, but they are
your Key Items, aren't they? Maybe we should
go after them.

302464.「ピコなら 北東の 崩れゆく廃墟の近くにある\n 枯れ木のとこに いるはずだ。ア:
Pico is supposed to be at the dead tree near the Crumbling Ruins to the northeast. That's where he goes whenever he gets bent out of
shape.

302465.「なら 私もいっしょに\n ……へ へ へっくしょん！！: Then I'll join you...heh heh heh heh!

302466.「ああ～！ ダメですよ ミトラー様～！\n そのままだと 風邪ひいちゃいますって:
Ahh~! No, Mr. Mitra~! You'll catch a cold if
you keep her like that! You'll catch a cold if
you don't drown her!

302467.「まったくです。\n 私たちが ピコさんを 追いかけますから\n 天使長は 無理:
Indeed. We will go after Pico-san, so please
don't strain yourself, Archangel.

302468.「ピコさんだって ちゃんと\n 話をすれば わかってくれるはずです。\n 急いで:
Even Pico will understand if you talk to him
properly. Let's hurry up and go after him!

302561.「あ～ おっかなかったぁ……。\n 思いっきり クラッシュしちゃったけど\n ア:
Oh, that was terrible... I crashed so hard. Is
my bike going to be okay?
